transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Good afternoon sir, main Abhisheka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji good afternoon.
Executive: Sir hamara jo aapka account matlab hamara jo catalog hai Mega Stone Industrial Solution actually sir aaj aapke account manager se baat hui thi Vishal Umrao se.
Customer: Right right right. Fir aapka feedback aaya tha wo not satisfied tha to sir kya issue matlab kya tha discussion mein ya koi service ke regarding aapka koi issue tha?
Customer: Nahi usme nahi meri ek meri ek complaint note thi uske upar maine notice satisfied kiya tha.
Customer: Maine complaint raise ki thi.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Yaha pe local local service support ke liye.
Executive: Achcha okay haan unhone mention kiya hai ki aapko local matlab service chahiye jo aapke office mein aake aapko service ke bare mein bata paye right sir?
Customer: Yes yes yes.
Executive: To ye sir actually kya hota hai ki jab service onboard ho jati hai to sara kuch handling head office se hota hai jaise ki jahan se abhi hum log baat kar rahe hain. But aap se matlab is bare mein kuch discussion kiya gaya tha kya pehle ki aapko koi person allot kiya jayega?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Aisa kuch baat hui thi aapke sath?
Customer: Nahi mera commitment jaise maine ye account open karwaya tha na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Tab mere ko commit kiya gaya tha aur yaha pe jitne bhi hamare jo bhi mere business friends mein hai. Unhone bhi jo account open karwaye the unko na do support mile hai.
Customer: Ek to local account manager mila hai aur ek apna jaise online mein jo hai Vaibhav jaise hai waise bhi support ek hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Mere ko to from the first day matlab main chase kar raha hu iske liye but abhi tak iska resolution nahi hua.
Executive: Theek hai sir main ek bar actually kya hota kya hai sir ek hai hamare matlab different different department hote hain wo kuch different different services ke according matlab aisa kuch allot hota hai.
Customer: But mere ko na main kam se kam 100 ko usme attend kar chuka hu is mamle mein but mere ko solution hi nahi mila hai.
Customer: Ab mere ko ye wahi ho raha hai ki main call attend karu ya na karu.
Executive: Nahi sir actually kya hai ki jis department se main baat kar rahi hu jahan aapka case aaya hai to waha pe kya hota hai ki sara kuch handling head office se hoti hai to but aapne bola hai ki ek case mein matlab ek person online dekh raha hai ek person offline dekh raha hai to main ek bar apne senior se discuss kar leti hu is cheez ke liye hum aage kya kar sakte hain. Aur ek abhi matlab agar aap abhi free ho to ek aad ghante mein main aapko update bhi kar du ki iske regarding hum kya help kar payenge aapki ya kya hum kuch bhi jo bhi help kar sakte hain ya jo bhi ho sakta hai is case mein to wo main aapko update kar dungi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ab main aapko aadhe ghante mein sir update karti hu iske bare mein sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir baki sir services wagera mein to koi issue nahi aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi baki issue nahi hai bas mere personal agar banda chhod yaar aayega na bas mera jo ke liye wo stand kar sakta hai.
Executive: Sir ek minute line pe rahenge sir abhi aayenge main aapki baat kara deti hu ek minute.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir bataiye good evening.
Customer: Haan good evening sir. Actually mera sir complaint maine lodge kiya hua tha around mere four ya five months ho chuke hain.
Executive: Haan. IndiaMART ka package liye hue right. Aapka 3 July ko live hua tha August September October November char mahine ho gaye.
Customer: Yes char mahine ho gaye. Abhi jaise ye mere ko package sale kiya tha na tab us time pe unka ek commitment tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ke ghar ki ek local support rahega local manager jo mere area mein jo bhi nearest jo unki branch hai waha se aayega as and when required. Right aur dusra rahega online support ek minute online support mere paas hai no doubt.
Executive: Hmm hmm. But local support tab se mere ko depute nahi kiya gaya hai.
Executive: Hmm. To uska maine complaint lodge kiya tha but abhi kya hai ki frequent calls aate hain. Right wo mere se feedback bhi lete hain sari cheeze lete hain but mere ko abhi tak resolution nahi mila uska.
Executive: To I guess theek hai abhi koi commitment written unhone diya tha ya fir kya kaisa tha?
Customer: Nahi written mein nahi diya tha written mein nahi diya tha aap dekhenge na to baki sab mein hai yaha pe jahan pe.
Executive: Haan actually to main kaise raha hu main check karwa leta hu matlab aap keh rahe ho ki aapke jo address hai 380049 jo pin code hai uske bagal mein visit ho rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Iske bagal mein visit ho rahi hai right kitne dur ke area mein?
Customer: Nahi uske uske bagal mein nahi meri jo office hai na.
Executive: Haan. Ye actually mera GST registered hai barabar uske upar maine liya tha uske baad maine office li hai Kathwada GIDC mein.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan to waha pe waha pe mere ko chahiye.
Executive: To waha pe visit hai to ye apne GST mein jo address hai wo change karwaya aapne?
Customer: Nahi wo nahi change karwaya.
Executive: To actually ab kya hota hai sir main aapko bata raha hu agar unhone bola to galat cheez to sabse pehle galat commitment hai ki ha bolna nahi chahiye dusri cheez jo aap keh rahe ho na ki jo naya wala aapka address hai matlab aapke package mein hai hi nahi kya ye wale jo package mein?
Customer: Main bata raha hu package package package ka nahi hota sir main bata raha hu aapko hamari 28 29 branches hai alag alag to Ahmedabad mein branch hai hamara Rajkot mein bhi hai to ek certain wo hota hai kilometer hota hai jisme easily hum visit kar sakte hain white se koi bhi jayega ya fir jo bhi visit hoga to easily ja sakta hai to jo nearby jo.
Executive: Theek hai. To. Haan to jo nearby hai na nearby visit hai jo kilometer ke hisab se visit ho jata hai to jo aapka naya jo office wala address hoga wo aapka nearby hoga jo hamara Ahmedabad branch hoga jo but hum jo sara kuch assign karte hain wo hum apne GST pe jo pin code hota hai area hota hai us hisab se assign karte hain. To ye jo aapka jo 380049 hai na wo hamare usme nahi aata hai area mein to jo baki jahan pe branch nahi pahunch sakte.
Customer: Nahi nahi 380049 se nearest hi hai aapki branch. Jaise Krishnagar mein aapki branch hai Maruti Plaza mein waha se mera nearest hi hai.
Executive: Aur aisa bhi nahi hai kitna kilometer?
Executive: Agar aisa hai to main check karwa lunga wo auto assign ho jata hai sir baki jo cases hote hain wo hamare head office jo Delhi jo IndiaMART ka hai Noida mein waha se handle hota hai virtual sir tele pe. Aur baki jo hai jo nearest jahan pe.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan ji sir wo 3 kilometer hi hai meri branch aapki jo Maruti Plaza mein jaise aap dekhenge na.
Executive: Main check karwa lunga mail dal ke mail dal ke check karwa lunga agar waha pe service di to bhi chalega to main fir wo ghar se wo karwa dunga jo bhi resolution aayega.
Executive: Sir nahi nahi nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hoga na jo GST pe hoga address. Haan to GST address pe to waha pe waha pe service provide kar do. Haan matlab waha se compare karenge agar hota hai main mail dal deta hu team ko agar wo service wale area hoga to bilkul assign ho jayega wo transfer ho jayega aapke branch office mein nahi to aapko tele se hi run karna hoga sir services.
Executive: Dono cheez to hume koi problem hume problem nahi hai kahin bhi ho to IndiaMART mein hi koi bhi employee dekhega aapko catalog main ki aapko business milna chahiye aur benefit aana chahiye.
Customer: Sir main uske liye main uske liye hi aapko bol raha hu ki mera wo kya hai requirement jaruri hai.
Executive: Call pe call pe resolve nahi ho pa raha aapki jo problem hai aapne.
Customer: Call pe wo samajh nahi payenge sir main batata hu wo level of accuracy nahi hoti hai call pe aap aap samjho. Kyunki yaha pe jo local banda local banda jo hota hai na sir ye sir online ka zamana hai but ye galat hai matlab argument de rahe ho alag baat hai but wo business lane ke liye sir wo nahi hai.
Customer: Kyunki yaha pe yaha pe sir kya hota hai na local jo banda hota hai na wo frequently alag alag company ko visit karta hai mere area mein jahan mera industrial zone hai right ab kuch cheeze aayi jo main yaha pe front mein discuss kar sakta hu samjhe aap jo mere mind mein jo maine summarize kiya list out kiya mere problems jo bhi aa rahe hain basket mein daily jo mere leads jo wrong aa rahe hain to sari cheeze main unko us time pe kar sakta hu aur wo promptly mere ko visit karke at least solve kar sakte hain wo cheezon ko.
Customer: Samjhe aap. To sari cheeze jyada productive hai effective hai dono ke liye aapki branch ke liye bhi aur mere liye bhi jisse services li hui hai isliye main being ka matlab positive side ye kar raha hu ke requirement meri jaruri hai jahan pe mere ko solution mil jae to achcha hai.
Executive: Main aisa karta hu Deepak sahab ki main mail dal raha hu theek hai apne matlab jo team mein ki ye ho sakta hai ki nahi transfer agar ho jayega to fair enough nahi to fir koi aur option to nahi hai but main I will try main mail dal ke clear kar dunga sir abhi.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir isme help kijiye sir hai na mere ko.
Executive: Sir hume hume koi problem hi nahi hai sir wo to kahin se bhi service IndiaMART ke hi degi aapko sir.
Customer: Mere ko mere ko package bhi upgrade karna hai par wo main tab karunga na jab mera wo productive yaha pe use hoga.
Executive: Sir package agar upgrade karna hai dekho handle jo hota hai to dekho IndiaMART ke head office mein sare log rehte hain company ke owner se leke CEO sare department yahi hai sir wo to branch hai jahan pe chota sa setup hai jahan pe 40 50 log kam karte hain yaha pe sirf 1500 log kam kar rahe hain to har ek department jo hota hai na sir IndiaMART ka yahi pe rehta hai to hum mujhe nahi lagta ki main bhi aath saal se hu koi problem aati hai jab covid mein hamara sare branches band ho gaye the fir bhi visit nahi ho rahi thi to head office se hi chal raha tha to koi dikkat nahi aani chahiye agar fir bhi aap keh rahe ho to I will try but aapko koi bhi discussion karni hai to humse kar sakte ho aap sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Bataiye aap video meeting kar karke dekhiye aise mail dal de raha hu main but ek video meeting karke dekhiye aapka main resolve karwa paunga mujhe lagta hai main 90% sure hu ki aapki jo problem hai usko acknowledge kar dunga sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir main karta hu ek bar otherwise main video call ek bar video meeting kar lijiye humse theek hai abhi is ticket ko close kar de raha hu aap video meeting mujhe mujhse kar lijiye aur main concern department mein dal dunga apni changes ke liye sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Pehle sir isko initiate to kar dijiye aap. Haan main initiate to abhi kar dunga sir usme koi problem nahi. Initiate to abhi kar dunga sir theek hai baki agar service se related hai upgrade ki baat hai to aap kar lijiye sir video meeting pe kal.
Customer: Theek hai sir waise Vaibhav ka service bad hua tha mera to uska support achcha hai waise so far koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Haan na. To wahi to keh rahe hain na ki matlab abhi jo mam baat kare to unka bhi support hai aap ek bar baat to karke dekho uska uska introduction ek cheez batao ek cheez batao aap bhi apne buyer se baat karoge to call pe hi baat karoge sab jagah to visit nahi kar sakte to kahin na kahin online call pe nahi kar paunga aap samjhe ha bas wahi point pe main aa raha hu sari cheeze call pe nahi hogi buyer se ha but wo kai cheeze hoti hai jaise out of 10 uski queries hai na to seven queries main call pe solve kar sakta hu ha ha but agar koi hamare Delhi ke Delhi ke client hai Delhi ka client hai ya fir Mumbai ka client hai har jagah branch banaiye service support banaiye sir uske liye hi banaya hai. Achcha achcha aur ye service industries bhi hai aap sir main ye business mere ko malum hai sir isliye otherwise to main agar itna sir to main khali sir ye point escalate karne ka mera koi sir nahi hai wo hai hi nahi sir koi nahi main try karunga sir serviceable hoga to 200% wo transfer ho jayega nahi to hum office se hi handle karenge aa raha hai isliye main aapko bata raha hu aur jo hai jo problem hai usko aap ek bar video meeting kar lo kal morning mein aur acknowledge ho jayega sir aapke theek hai baki main isko explain kar deta hu aur aap abhi main close kar dunga Himanshu Raj. Okay sir thank you thank you right right ha ji ji ji ji mujhe koi problem nahi hai sir hone bhi nahi chahiye koi dikkat nahi hai abhi main isko close kar de raha hu mere naam ka feedback jarur de dijiyega and I will 100% kal tak ya fir parso tak aapke paas jaunga iske sath ki ho payega hua ki nahi main abhi tak theek hai okay thank you very much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Local support not provided as committed.

- Frequent calls without resolution.

- Wants local support for business growth.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss with senior about local support.

- Executive will update in an hour.

- Suggested a video meeting to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send a mail to team.

- Customer to have a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- local support, resolution, commitment, gst, branch, video meeting
